properties.entry: INSERT INTO ORDERS ( ORDER_ID , CUSTOMER_ID , PRODUCT_ID , QUANTITY , ORDER_DATE , IS_DELETED ) VALUES ( ORDERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'N' )

SELECT O.ORDER_ID , C.CUSTOMER_ID , P.PRODUCT_ID , O.QUANTITY , O.ORDER_DATE , O.IS_DELETED FROM ORDERS O JOIN CUSTOMER C ON O.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE O.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC
UPDATE ORDERS SET QUANTITY = ? WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = ? AND QUANTITY = ?
UPDATE ORDERS SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE ORDER_ID = ? AND CUSTOMER_ID = ?
